name: Filip Rozpedek
content: Filip RozpedekSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationFilip RozpedekAbout meI am an Assistant Professor in the Manning College of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Massachusetts Amherst.I obtained my PhD in 2019 from QuTech at TU Delft where I worked in the group of Stephanie Wehner on the building blocks of quantum networks.From 2019 to 2023 I was a postdoc in the group of Liang Jiang at the Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering at the University of Chicago working on quantum repeaters for quantum communication.You can find my Google Scholar profile here.Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
